.mkv files are for Apple computers, iPads and iPhones. it is a Quicktime file extension used by macintosh so that things can be compressed into smaller files for phone usage (like the iPhone) Sony does not offer this extension for the PS3, because it is not an apple product. you can download a media converter (like iMedia) and convert your file extensions into .avi or .mp4 for them to play on the PS3

'why won t mkv films work through my ps3?'

It's just not a format/container that Sony allows.

Use mkv2vob to make the file compatible.
